pdf.head:
InXpress Ledger Report
<#if .locale == "zh_CN">
<#elseif .locale == "zh_TW">
<#elseif .locale == "ja_JP">
<#elseif .locale == "ko_KR">
<#elseif .locale == "th_TH">
</#if>
pdf.body:
<#if results?size != 0><#list results as result></#list>
    </#if>
  
     
 
     
Report Generated: ${results.today}

      
		<#list results.subsidiary_data as subsidiary_data>
		

		
 ${subsidiary_data.legalname} 
		
 ${subsidiary_data.address1} 
		
${subsidiary_data.address2} ${subsidiary_data.city} 
		
${subsidiary_data.state}
		
GST : ${subsidiary_data.taxregistrationnumber} 
               	
${results.vendor_name} 
               
Ledger Account 
		
		</#list>
		
		
		

	
		
Opening Balance As of ${results.start_date} : ${results.symbol} ${results.open_bal} 
		
Closing Balance As of ${results.end_date} : ${results.symbol} ${results.close_bal} 
		
		
		
		
		
            
                

                    Date
                    Posting
                    Type
                    Journal Name
                    Account Code
                    Amount Dr
                    Amount Cr
                    Narration
                
            
            
			
                <#list results.delaer_obj as delaer_obj>
				

					${delaer_obj.trandate}
				${delaer_obj.postingperiod} 
				${delaer_obj.type}
				${delaer_obj.account?replace('&','&') } 
				${delaer_obj.account_type}
				${delaer_obj.debitamount?replace('-','') }
				${delaer_obj.creditamount?replace('-','') }
				${delaer_obj.memo}
				
				</#list>
